newsletters.summary: A daily recap of world events.

newsletters.name: Pro Gardening
newsletters.summary: Tips by and for those with a green thumb in the garden.
newsletters.description: A collection of expert gardening tips and news, with a curated list of the latest articles, blog posts, and studies on plant care, landscaping, and eco-friendly gardening practices. Each link is accompanied by a brief summary to help you dig deeper into your garden projects.

newsletters.name: World Climate News
newsletters.summary: Things are heating up!  We'll tell you why and what you can do.

newsletters.name: MLS News
newsletters.description: Stay updated with Major League Soccer through a curated list of articles, match reports, player transfers, and league news. Each newsletter features summaries and links to the most relevant stories for soccer fans across North America.

newsletters.name: Breaking World News
newsletters.description: Get the top breaking global stories, with a curated selection of the most urgent news articles and reports from trusted sources. Each issue includes a brief description of each link to help you quickly understand and follow the unfolding events.

newsletters.name: Software Development Lifestyle
newsletters.summary: Keep up with the latest in the ever changing world of software development.
newsletters.description: A curated collection of resources for software developers, featuring links to blog posts, tutorials, and articles on coding techniques, work-life balance, and industry trends. Each link is accompanied by a description to offer you key insights and advice in your development journey.
